function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Highly communicable disease (COVID-19)","Impact":"Serious illness and death for people with underlying comorbidities such as diabetes, hypertension, and obesity","Mitigation":"Vaccination, public health measures, and access to preventive care","Technologies":"Vaccines, telemedicine, and health monitoring apps","People":"Children and adults with underlying comorbidities","Owner":"Healthcare providers, governments, and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Poor management of key risk factors due to COVID-19 response measures","Impact":"Increased risk of unhealthy diets, limited physical activity, and poor access to preventive care","Mitigation":"Promotion of healthy behaviors, telehealth services, and community support programs","Technologies":"Telehealth platforms, health and fitness apps, community outreach tools","People":"Communities affected by COVID-19 response measures","Owner":"Public health organizations, community leaders, and healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Negative impact on the nutritional status of women and children","Impact":"Worsening nutritional status and potential increase in prevalence of wasting","Mitigation":"Targeted nutritional support programs, access to healthy food, and community-based detection and management of malnutrition","Technologies":"Nutritional tracking apps, community-based healthcare services, and food distribution platforms","People":"Women and children, especially in low- and middle-income countries","Owner":"International aid organizations, NGOs, and local healthcare providers"}]}
